snippet.title: Plane bomb plot accused charged
snippet.content:
A Sydney man arrested over a plot to bomb a plane bound for the Middle East has been charged with a non-terror related offence.
4 MINS AGO UPDATED 3 MINS AGO
A fourth Sydney man accused of involvement in a plot to bomb a plane destined for the Middle East has been charged with a non-terror related offence.
The 39-year-old was arrested last Saturday alongside three other men, two of whom were later charged with preparing for or planning a terrorist act while the other was released without charge.
The fourth man was on Sunday bailed to appear in Downing Centre Local Court on August 24 charged with possessing a prohibited weapon.
